# Literature review summary tables {#sec-appendix-a .appendix}

## Factors influencing bank survival {#sec-appendix-lit-survival}

| Factor | Specific Indicator | Effect Direction | Effect Size | Source |
|:---|:---|:---|:---|:---|
| **Financial Fundamentals** | | | | |
| Bank Size | Total assets (log) | Negative on failure | −0.236 to −0.385\*\*\* | @barajas_SurvivalRussianBanks_2023 |
| Profitability | ROA | Negative on failure | −12.0 to −82.3\*\*\* | Multiple sources |
| Capital Adequacy | Equity-to-assets | Negative on failure | −0.025 to −1.66\*\*\* | Multiple sources |
| Liquidity | Liquid assets ratio | Negative on failure | −1.93 to −2.39\*\*\* | @fungacova_PoliticsBankFailures_2022 |
| Asset Quality | NPL ratio | Positive on failure | 1.49 to 1.87\*\*\* | @fungacova_PoliticsBankFailures_2022 |
| **Ownership** | | | | |
| Foreign Control | Foreign bank >50% | Negative on failure | −0.989 to −0.993\*\*\* | @barajas_SurvivalRussianBanks_2023 |
| State Ownership | State dummy | Mixed | Varied | @weill_HowCorruptionAffects_2011 |
| **Political** | | | | |
| Electoral Cycles | Pre-election periods | Negative on failure | −0.50 to −1.21\*\* | @fungacova_PoliticsBankFailures_2022 |
| Corruption | Regional measures | Negative on lending | −0.182 to −0.340\*\*\* | @weill_HowCorruptionAffects_2011 |
| **Market Structure** | | | | |
| Competition | Lerner index | Negative (more competition $\rightarrow$ failure) | −1.46 to −3.36\*\*\* | @fungacova_DoesCompetitionInfluence_2013a |

: Factors influencing bank survival and performance in Russia. {#tbl-lit-survival}
